impact-statement: Cytonemes mediate, and are essential for, Wingless signaling from the <italic>Drosophila</italic> wing disc to disc-associated myoblasts and for Delta-Notch signaling from these myoblasts to the dorsal air sac primordium.

competing-interest.conf1: The authors declare that no competing interests exist.
